message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. 60-40 is a good starting point. We can negotiate from here.
I think we can both do better than a 60-40 split. I'm willing to give you a little more, but I want the majority share. What do you say?
I'm not willing to accept a 65-35 split. I think I can do better than that.
I'm willing to compromise. 58-42 seems like a fair split to me. What do you think, Bob?
